item.title: How to contribute a post
item.description: Why contribute a post? When we started thinking about setting up the Sydney R-Ladies group, we wanted to have some central resource where people contribute posts, tutorials, or anything that they wanted to share with the group. Thatâ€™s the role we hope this blog can play! Our thinking is that this can serve a few different purposes. Suppose that Jen gives a really awesome workshop at one of the meetups (and she does give great talks!
